SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 38
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
38 
W3C TIME USE CASES: WEB SERVICES 
Web services (e.g. air ticketing): a time ontology allow representing concepts like CreditCardExpirationDate 
and making inferences with them. 
http://www.memory-srl.com.ar/img/como/3.jpg 
Hobbs JR, Feng P (eds) (2006) Time Ontologies in OWL. W3C Working Draft 2. 
http://www.w3.org/TR/owl-time/
speaker: SYSTEM
